Computer.name: Alex's Laptop
Computer.file:
EOSDeviceScan.exe will find EOS devices connected to the device you're running it from.
The login for any EOS device should always be "admin" "alpine," and now I can hack dad. I win.
To-do: get dad to allow torrent in the router and use TorrentStreamInjector.exe to bypass router password too. I'm so clever it's disgusting.
These new /bin's should let me bypass that kid filter and download cool programs like that eOS one.
